title: Google messages only shows phone numbers and RCS doesnt work
content:
Its been 6 months if not more since i have those problems and no one at google can help me! 
Contacts are missing  im only able to see their phone number ðŸ˜‚
Rcs doesnt even work 99% of the time, my friends have Huawei and samsung devices and it works just fine, please explain that..
How is that possible a GOOGLE phone can not work with its stock apps, google live chat doesnt even know how to fix the problem i tried speaking with them a lot of times for this and a few other problems with my 4a but i dont know they don't give a f* lr they exist to make y go to meltdown?

If google doesnt know how to Fix these things i dont know why they trying to make people switch from ios t android!
(And yes i tried replacing my sim card, factory reset my device, try a beta versions, updating me device even with the latest android 11 dp3 beta!, And anything else i can think of)
And this is one of another 100 problems google devices have!
